resources.string: This is an alarm application that interfaces with the Wheelphone to provide a playful experience when the alarm rings. \nSimply set an alarm (for the next 24 hours). Alternatively, you can quickly set an alarm 5 seconds from the current time by pressing the \"Quick alarm\" button. \n Moreover you can specify the escaping speed of the robot and time (seconds) that the robot will wait before escaping from you.http://www.wheelphone.com
